tuv.seg: <a1>OmegaT</a1> automatically detects glossary files in this folder when a project is opened.
<a1>OmegaT</a1> pou detek otomatikman bann fisie gloser dan sa dosie-la letan enn proze ouver.
As the existing content will not be touched, damage to an existing file would be limited.
Etan done ki konteni existan pa pou modifie, pa pou ena erer dan fisie existan.
Check in <m0> <s1> <k2> <k3>Ctrl</k3> <k4>E</k4> </k2> </s1> <g5>Project</g5> <g6>Properties</g6> </m0>.
Get dan <m0> <s1> <k2> <k3>Ctrl</k3> <k4>E</k4> </k2> </s1> <g5>Proze</g5> <g6>Propriete</g6> </m0>.
Check that your dict files are in the correct folder (or in a subfolder below it).
Chek si ou fisier dict dan bon dosier (ouswa dan enn soudosier sa dosier la).
Dictionaries
Diksioner
Dictionaries in <a0>OmegaT</a0> are based on the StarDict or on the Lingvo DSL format.
Diksioner dan <a0>OmegaT</a0> baze lor forma StarDict ouswa Lingvo DSL.
Does the folder contain three files of the same name, with extensions?
Eski dosier la ena trwa fisier mem non, avek extansion?
Download the file - it should be a <f0>tarball</f0> archive (extension <e1>tar.bz</e1> or <e2>tar.bz2</e2>).
Download fisier la - li pou enn arsiv <f0>tarball</f0> (extansion <e1>tar.bz</e1> ouswa <e2>tar.bz2</e2>).
Glossaries
Gloser
Glossaries are files created and updated manually for use in <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
Bann gloser, zot bann fisie ki finn kree ek updated manielman pour itilizasion dan <a0>OmegaT</a0>.
Glossary pane
Vole Gloser
How to download and install dictionaries
Kouma download ek instal diksioner
If an <a0>OmegaT</a0> project contains one or more glossaries, any terms in the glossary which are also found in the current segment will be automatically displayed in the Glossary viewer.
Si enn proze <a0>OmegaT</a0> ena enn (ouswa plizier) gloser, tou bann term gloser-la ki dan segman an kour afise otomatikman dans vole Gloser.
If it is <e0>tar.bz</e0>, you have forgotten to unpack (untar) it.
Si li <e0>tar.bz</e0>, ou finn blie dekonpres (desarsiv) li.
If only one file is present, check its extension.
Si ena enn sel fisier, get so lextansion.
If the file already exists, no attempt is done to verify the format or the character set of the file: the new entries will always be in tab-separated format and UTF-8.
Si fisie-la deza existe, pa pou ena verifikasion so forma ou so set karakter: bann nouvo lantre pou touzour forma text separe par tabilation ek UTF-8.
Merriam Webster dictionary - use
Itilisation diksioner Merriam Webster
Note that in addition to "source-target" dictionaries you can, using the Dictionary feature, obtain access to information such as:
Pran kont ki an plis bann diksioner "sours-sib", kapav, si itiliz fonktion Diksioner, aksed lezot linformasion kouma:
Problems with dictionaries
Problem ek diksioner
Search for the required language combination - for instance on the <u0>dictionary links given by the OmegaT Wiki</u0>.
Serse konbinezon langaz ki bizin - get par exanp lors <u0>bann lien pou diksioner ki ena lors Wiki OmegaT</u0>
Some of the dictionaries have no strings attached - i.e. are "Free to use", and others, like the selection above, are under the GPL license.
Sertin diksioner aksesib san kondision (setadir zot ‘lib’) alors ki lezot (kouma seleksion lao la) soumi lisans GPL/GNU.
Terms in the current segment which <a2>OmegaT</a2> finds in the glossary file(s) are displayed in the Glossary pane:
Bann term segman en kour ki <a2>OmegaT</a2> trouve dan fisie gloser pou afise dan vole Gloser:
The extension must be <f0>.txt</f0> or <f1>.utf8</f1> (if not, it will be added).
So lextansion bizin <f0>.txt</f0> ouswa <f1>.utf8</f1> (sinon li pou insere otomatikman).
The file does not need to exist when setting it, it will be created (if necessary) when adding a glossary entry.
Fisie-la pas bizin existe letan konfigirasion, li pou kree (si neseser) kan azoute premie lantre dan gloser.
The following example shows Merriam Webster 10th dictionary "in action":
Sa lexanp la montre diksioner Merriam Webster 10th ‘an aksion’:
The location of the file must be within the <f2>/glossary</f2> folder, but it can be in a deeper folder (e.g., <f3>glossary/sub/glossary.txt</f3>).
Fisie-la bizin dan dosie <f2>/glossary</f2>, me il kapav dan enn soudosie (ex.: <f3>glossary/sub/glossary.txt</f3>).
There should be three files, with extensions <e1>dz, idx </e1>and <e2>ifo</e2>.
Pou ena trwa fisier ek extansion <e1>dz, idx </e1>ek <e2>ifo</e2>.
To install the necessary files for the StarDict format, proceed as follows:
Pou instal bann fisier StarDict neseser, bizin:
To use an existing glossary, simply place it in the <f0>/glossary</f0> folder after creating the project.
Pou itiliz enn gloser, met li sinpleman dans dosier <f0>/glossary</f0> apre kreasion proze.
Usage
Itilizasion
Use untar utility (or its equivalent, for instance<f0> winrar</f0> in Windows) to extract its contents into the project folder "Dictionary".
Itiliz itiliter desarsivaz ‘untar’ (ouswa enn lekivalan, par exanp <f0> winrar</f0> dan Windows) pour ekstrer fisier so konteni dan dosie "Dictionary" proze la.
You define its location and name in the project properties dialog.
Ou kapav definir so lanplasman ek so nom dan bwat dialog propriete proze.
